mapper.insert: insert into reply (replyNum, UsersID, Contents, PostDate, BoardNum) values ((select ifnull(max(r.replyNum),0)+1 from reply r), #{usersID}, #{contents}, #{postDate}, #{boardNum})

insert into reply (replyNum, ParentNum, Count, ChildCount, UsersID, Contents, PostDate, BoardNum) values ((select ifnull(max(r.replyNum),0)+1 from reply r), #{parentNum}, #{count}, #{childCount}, #{usersID}, #{contents}, #{postDate}, #{boardNum})
mapper.update: update reply set ChildCount = #{ChildCount} where ParentNum = #{ParentNum}
update reply set Contents = #{contents} where replyNum = #{replyNum}
